DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety sunscreen product supervise outdoor-use condition target consumer
DOC.brief_title: Outdoor-Use Test Sunscreen Products Children Ages 3 9 Years Old
DOC.criteria: Subject must healthy , male females 3 9 year age medical condition skin . Subjects must Fitzpatrick Skin Type I , II , III IV . Subjects must agree restrict sun exposure activity least five day immediately precede participation study . Subjects must actinic keratoses , skin cancer , psoriasis , eczema , acute chronic skin condition . Subjects must visible erythema , blistering , peel would indicate recent sunburn determine baseline skin evaluation . Subjects must significantly tan skin .
